mozhi.ocr.text_cropping¶

class mozhi.ocr.text_cropping.cropping.SROIE2019TextImageCropper(input_dir, file_ext, out_dir, num_threads)[source]¶

Bases: object

Splits the text image into individual line images, based on teh vertices starting from top.

Receipt(.png/.jpg)

x1_1, y1_1,x2_1,y2_1,x3_1,y3_1,x4_1,y4_1, transcript_1 x1_2,y1_2,x2_2,y2_2,x3_2,y3_2,x4_2,y4_2, transcript_2 x1_3,y1_3,x2_3,y2_3,x3_3,y3_3,x4_3,y4_3, transcript_3 …

process()[source]¶

Args:

input_dir: SROIE2019 data directory file_ext: .jpeg out_dir: num_threads:
